about_the_game:
Draft Fever Bowl is a competitive football management simulation game. Scout prospects, make strategic trades online and compete for star players on the draft. Every decision counts!

Climb the ranks, qualify for the Fever Bowl and compete for ultimate glory! Step on the field and see your roster in action through a fully 3D and realistic match engine!

Draft Players!


Engage with our comprehensive and immersive drafting system that refreshes every week. Be strategic to secure the best picks, scout through over 100 colleges, and discover hidden gems to enhance your roster.

Watch the Action!


Witness the thrill of the game with our advanced 3D match simulation engine. See your team in action, with each individual player vividly brought to life, showcasing their skills and teamwork on the field.

Make Online Trades


Experience a robust trade system that allows you to negotiate and trade picks and players with other users. Your players are unique, collectible cards that you can watch perform in exciting match simulations.

Build Your Roster!


Build and manage your dream team by assembling the best players and devising winning strategies. Focus on team synergy and tactical depth to secure victories and climb the competitive ranks.

Real-Time Events!


Immerse yourself in the dynamic world of "Draft Fever Bowl," where game events are synchronized with real-life time. Seasons, championships, games, and draft nights are scheduled as live events. Participate in real-time or asynchronously, ensuring you never miss out on the action.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10 / 11 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K @ 3.50GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 1600 @ 3.2 GHZ
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960 / GTX 1650 or AMD Radeon™ RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10 / 11 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700 @ 3.40GHz or AMD Ryzen 7 2700X @ 3.7 GHZ
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1080Ti / RTX 3060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 6600XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Draft Fever Bowl is a competitive multiplayer football management simulation game. Scout prospects, compete in the draft, recruit star players, and make online strategic trades with other teams! Step into the shoes of coaches and GMs in this football experience!
